search Package¶

searchIndexer Module¶

fla.gr daemon piece for indexing things when certian messages come through zmq

For more information, see: https://github.com/JoshAshby/

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

searchUtils Module¶

fla.gr aid for talking with the search daemon

For more information, see: https://github.com/JoshAshby/

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

utils.search.searchUtils.updateSearch(man=False)¶

Triggers fla.gr’s search index to be updated

Parameters:man – True or False for if this is a manual update
